metadata.title: Little Sheep Logistics | Southeast Asia Cross-border Logistics
metadata.description: Consolidation to Taiwan, Thailand, Cambodia, Malaysia, Indonesia. Your professional international logistics partner.

home.heroSubtitle: Consolidation to Taiwan, Thailand, Cambodia, Malaysia & Indonesia
home.introText: We provide one-stop consolidation and logistics solutions for cross-border sellers and individuals, covering Taiwan, Thailand, Cambodia, Malaysia, Indonesia and more. Your cargo, delivered safely and efficiently.

tracking.title: Tracking
tracking.subtitle: Enter your tracking number to see parcel status
tracking.sectionDesc: Enter your tracking number to view real-time parcel updates
tracking.queryFailed: Query failed. Please try again later.
tracking.noInfo: No tracking info for this number. Please check the number or contact support.
tracking.noTrajectory: No tracking history yet. Check again later or contact support.

shippingCalc.subtitle: Enter parcel details for an estimated chargeable weight and total freight (estimate only)

shippingCalc.noRate: No rate for this route. Please contact support.
shippingCalc.loginToSave: Please log in to save the order

shippingServices.title: Shipping Services
shippingServices.subtitle: Multiple options for different speed and budget needs
shippingServices.airDesc: 3–5 days. Best for small or urgent parcels.
shippingServices.seaBulkDesc: 12–15 days. Low cost, ideal for furniture and appliances.
